element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text: Geoprocess for the creation of a graph in which the temporal distribution of the events of the input layer in the form of strips of days and hours will be represented. When the interval of hours is not continuous, a small space will be shown between sectors to mark the time separation. It is possible to set both ranges of days and hours.

image.description: Example of parameters with all values
Aoristic clock with all days (0-6) and all hours (0-23)
Example with limited range of hours and days
Aoristic clock with specific days (2-4,6) and range of values (8-14,19-22)

element.name: RANGEHOURS
element.text: Hours range to show. It can be selected all (empty text box or 0-23), some ranges (9-12,15-21), o some specific hours (9-15,16,19,21)

element.name: RANGEDAYS
element.text: Days range to show. Select 0 for monday and 6 for sunday. It can be selected all (left empty or 0-6), select ranges (0-3), or specific days (0-2,4,6)

element.name: FILTEREXPRESSION
element.text: Expression to filter de input layer

element.name: INITIAL_X
element.text: X center coordinate for the creation of the graph

element.name: INITIAL_Y
element.text: Y center coordinate for the creacion of th graph
